example.eg: It only took the dentist a few seconds to extract the tooth.
example.egtrans: 牙医只用了几秒钟便拔出了智齿。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 取出, 提取, 拔出, 移除

example.eg: The hacker extracted some sensitive information from the government website.
example.egtrans: 黑客从政府网站上获取了一些敏感信息。

example.eg: Jenna included an extract from the author's writings.
example.egtrans: 珍娜还摘录了一段作者的作品。

example.eg: Extracts of plants like vanilla can be used to flavour certain dishes.
example.egtrans: 如香草精等植物提取物可以为某些食谱调味。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 榨出物, 提取物, 提炼物

example.eg: A drop of almond extract adds flavor to the crust of a fruit pie.
The bark extract from some evergreens can cure scurvy.
This cookie recipe requires vanilla extract.
